Type.Name: ParentSetHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ParentSetHandler(object o, ParentSetArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ParentSetHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ParentSetHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ParentSetHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ParentSetHandler is removed from the event.
